text: Have you heard of transhumanism? If not, we believe that you should have. For us, transhumanism is of the utmost importance to the evolution of humanity and the continual growth of the human race due to the present, near future and long-term threats that society is facing. Transhumanism will be the key to our survival and we all need to get on board before it's too late. We're going to convince you today on why transhumanism is our last hope. Transhumanism has infinite possibilities, scientists have been creating bionic arms genetically-empreaged animals and have even suggested the idea of digital immortality. What is digital immortality? Digital immortality is the reconstruction of a personality in digital form. It is evident that people want to live ever, although it has never been considered a realistic option. It has always made this subject of fiction. With improved technology, it has become a more probable.

segments.text: to our survival and we all
